definition: to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: The damp rising from the ground caused the walls to stain badly.
sentences.chinese: 地面上升起的潮气使墙壁的颜色变得很难看。

sentences.english: His face was covered in ugly red blotch es.
sentences.chinese: 他脸上有许多难看的红色大斑点。

sentences.english: That's far uglier than a yellowing lawn.
sentences.chinese: 这远比黄色的草坪更难看。

sentences.english: Smoking makes your teeth yellow and ugly.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟让你的牙齿变得又黄又难看。

sentences.english: P18 2a, He should stop wearing that silly earring.
sentences.chinese: 他应该停止戴那个难看的耳环。

sentences.english: A miss off the backboard then followed an awkward-looking jump shot.
sentences.chinese: 接下来他投丢一球，然后又送上一个动作难看的跳投。

sentences.english: It is hard to see it escalating into an all-out war.
sentences.chinese: 很难看出这场战争会升级为一场全面战争。

sentences.english: The worst of Bath was the number of its plain women.
sentences.chinese: 巴思的最大缺点，就是难看的女人大多。

sentences.english: DON'T fall into the trap of wearing ugly footwear just because it's comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 掉入舒适而难看的鞋子陷阱。

sentences.english: White cement use a month will become a black seam, it was terrible.
sentences.chinese: 白水泥使用一个月就会变成黑缝，难看死了。

sentences.english: The nail perforated her coat and left an ugly rip.
sentences.chinese: 钉子穿透她的上衣，留下一块难看的破绽。

sentences.english: And seen from this end of the century it's not hard to see why.
sentences.chinese: 从本世纪末的目标中，就不难看出这是什么原因。

sentences.english: The scar on the polished tabletop is an eyesore.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个显而易见的最难看的惨象。

sentences.english: This would be a cool white and unpleasant too look at.
sentences.chinese: 因为这是一种冷白，很难看。

sentences.english: My worser spirit a woman colour'd ill.
sentences.chinese: 我的坏精灵是一个难看的女人。

definition: in a difficult situation/to cut a sorry figure/scoundrel! (derog.)
not well/out of sorts/in a bad mood/without discrepancy/accurate
